testnet.modal.title: Welcome to the HydraDX Testnet
testnet.modal.description.1.text: We are dedicated to continue improving HydraDX. Thank you for helping us by participating in the testnet.
testnet.modal.description.2.text: While we have a strict no-cookies policy on mainnet, our testnet app does use üç™.
testnet.modal.description.3.text: This is required by <0>Sentry.io</0> which collects certain non-sensitive data such as OS and browser info.
testnet.modal.description.4.text: If you agree to this, please click Yes, let me enter, otherwise click No, take me back.

stats.title: Omnipool Stats
stats.tiles.trade.title: Trade
stats.tiles.trade.content: The Omnipool uses LRNA as a "hub" token through which all trades are routed, avoiding the segmentation of liquidity inherent to AMMs which require. <0/><0/>LPs to provide liquidity for a pair of tokens. Both transaction fees and partial impermanent loss mitigation.

stats.tiles.rewards.description: Earn up to 5% APR by providing liquidity to Hydra.
